item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: OLD rasta. I am ex rasta. Was there when Arwint the founder was. Phelan is kage right?Were you there pre or during war?

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded:
They can take out 2 Kaiju a day! Crazy never seen a kaiju go down in less than 2 and that was old Rasta.

What are you talking about? I'm in Rasta Village and they take out 2-3 kaiju per day…

And sorry for being off topic

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: I believe The Epic/ScarletP took less than that time to kill a 20k HP kaiju.

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: ya toxic used to be like that, we would summon 3 kaiju a day. our record holds at killing a 20,000 HP kaiju in 26 min.

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: Eh i know but i was JW. If he had alts he could use them. Oh and Thanks to yo Yoshirou i got Sannin and Finsihed Mono. Did everything i could in S2. Waste, Mono, Trade3, and Sannin! Theres more, but ill spare you. Also think ill leave my village with giffica (The Uchiha) and send him to Shoukyaku. Is like DROP city over there! They can take out 2 Kaiju a day! Crazy never seen a kaiju go down in less than 2 and that was old Rasta. They were crazy for the time. That time would be the first war if you were around then.

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: Hey me again! Would you take 300 smokebombs for any of these?

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded:

  • Caparace Armor
  • Catgirl Entourage

  • Monkey Cymbals

I Want

  • Hacksaw
  • Tire Tracks

I am willing to trade any 2 of these monster drops for either the hacksaw or tire tracks.

I also have a Spirit of the Sand that i will trade for a Spirit of the Fox.

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: I would like to trade 2 silver elixirs & 1 smoke bomb for 52 fur squares (trade value calculated via the rate listed above). I can trade today or tomorrow.

item.content:encoded: at the moment they are already in a trade, sorry. but if the other trader declines the trade then i'll pm you.

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: Eh i dont just want to rob someone of all their items. and its fine Zeekee. i like to leave messages too like this one. ^_^ and ya same with me Giffica, i can get tons of items a day except smokebombs. they dont come easy for me.

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: Yo zeekee its really not much. I have 3 alts with stabilization and multiple goo's. I have tons of day and nightshades. smokebombs….its called 3 days with billy, claus and olmek….boom over 30 per day.

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded:
You sure know how to get the nectar out of a deal Yoshirou ^^

(And sorry for not posting anything that has with me and you trading items at the moment, I just wanted to leave a comment…)

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: Well first of all i do get a Super potion everyday because i have a fruits basket so i get many ingredients, so i usuallly get 4 power flowers a day and i have many tasty twigs so i can usually make one a day. That's without using Nadeshiko's jutsu to double the ingredients too. BUT, i really dont want to trade a drop for something else, but if you are sooooooooo desperate, i willl make a ONE time exception for you, i will give you my book of spoilers if you are willing to trade your GP, 2 supers, 2 hourglasses, and 50 smokebombs for it. Im not asking for everything just a portion. Message back if you accept. I can bucket trade today if you can.

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: What? No you cant……..i have 3 btw. ALso stealth stincks if you have it already. If you have all the item its useless. You cant trade it for much since people who have kaiju drops dont want suits. Super Potins are very valuble to many since they are a huge boost. I offered you my Golden and 3 potions and CRW's+Reverse and Roatate for any drop including spoilers, but you dont want all of them. I also have multiple of each. If i had a rune this would be very easy, but i cant get a rune before chrismas for my sannin run. I need a drop to get Tea before chrismas or i have no chance in making sannin. I got 400000xp with annie and timmy alone using 500 stam so add another 600 to that and 6 elixars and 400000 from partys while having tea in my team for the missions and ill easily get it…..IF I HAVE A DROP! Ill do anything!

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: a super potion is definitely not the same value of a stealth suit. I can get a super potion everyday from getting power flowers from ingredient collecting. People dont get a super rare everyday.

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: Super Potion to stealth?

item.title: Re: My monster drops and items for trade.
item.content:encoded: How about a Magical Wand for a Soul of Steel/ Helix Tattoo? I really need one of those.Will add in a Mome if that's not enough.

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded:
1 super potion=20 fur square
1 hourglass=30 fur square
1 timesphere=25 fur square
1 silver elixer=25 fur square

These are my prices for fur squares not really interested in other items too much.

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: Looking for fur squares, have a price on them?

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: At this moment i am not that interested in golden cause i dont have any use for more stam i am just using terri 3 for drops as i am just a villager and i can get the terri drop easy enough with my current stam. But your offer may interest me after awhile as looping is getting close for me. i'll think about it for later.

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded:
I got some potions and multiple smokebombs.
Golden Potion-1
Super Potion-3
Reversing Hourglass-3
Rotating Timephere-1
Smokebombs-113
Monochrome pheromone-22
CRW-4
Wasteland Rebrether-8
I would trade golden and any combo you want for any of your drops. Theres nothing i want besides kaiju drops. I know you said nothing, but drop for drop, but golden is just as hard to get as drops. If your a kage drops are a lot easier than golden. I would trade any combo of my items for a drop.

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: I would like to get 2 sham rocks….at a little bit over the rate you previously mentioned (I'll give you a total of 30 thirty food pills & 2 silver elixirs). Deal? I have you set to see my bucket

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded:
As posted in this thread 4 posts ago. I said:

Note: I am only accepting monster drops for my monster drops so please do not offer other things for them. Also please do not offer a drop that is not in the list of drops i dont have. only interested in those.

Sorry, no standard items for monster drops.

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: How much in standard items (Hourglass, Super Pots, etc) for a monster drop?

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded:
Ok here is the rundown for MoME.
1 MomE = any of these:
*4 silver elixers
*3 super potions
*30 smokebombs
*5 hourglasses
*7 timespheres

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: How much do you want per MoME?

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: Yoshirou, if you haven't traded the fox rune yet. Il give you 40k in permanent items for the fox rune.

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: OK…I think I can get two more dogs…have to ask my Kage. I just assumed since that you originally gave 15 elixirs or 30k ryo as options, that 5 elixirs = 10k ryo and therefore 1 elixir = 2k ryo. My bad. I currently have you set to see my bucket - my in-game name is also QDarthGE. I'll get the other two dogs shortly.

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: i will consider an elixer as 1K, if you can get 2 more dogs or 5K in ryo then ya, i will accept. either that or 5 more elixers than your offer. one of the two.

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: I still want it very badly….give me a day to pull some resources together. I'll pm (in game) tomorrow evening with an official offer. Would 8 ninja dogs and 5 silver elixirs work?

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded:
I would accept any of the following:
*30K in perm items.
*10 super potions
*200 smokebombs
*15 silver elixers
*2 golden potions
*10 hourglasses
*10 timespheres
*any monster drop what so ever.
*20 billy buckets.

that is about all i can think of, if you cant come up with any of those then give an offer and we will see about it. also be able to bucket trade.

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: What do you want for the Fox Rune? I am very interested in it.

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: Raven i'm sorry but im only trading my monster drops for other monster drops and only the ones listed at the moment. and Kimetou, thats fine i usually buy an avian spray everyday.

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: Would you consider trading the regalia for a Golden Potion + 100 smokebombs + 50 food pills?

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: If you want just one then something like 2 hourglasses, or 2 timespheres, or 2 silver elixers, or a superpotion, or a ninja dog. If you want both just double any of the items i just listed.

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: I am interested in the Ash-Covered Rare Shaft. Care to divulge any preference on price?

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded:
I have Persocom (1) : I would like Big Mouth (1)

Pm me ingame if you want to trade. Zeekee is the name!

item.title: Re: My items for trade
item.content:encoded: for 70 ash covered tiles, that would be the equivalent of 7 super potions, or 3 golden potions, or 15 silver elixers, or 100 smokebombs, or 50K ryo in perm items. that is for 70 i would trade a portion of them too. also Kreatur i will try my hardest to trade today but no promises.
